description: Out on a stroll, Pico is unexpectly knocked out by someone he...admittedly didn't see. When he wakes up, he's on top of a moving semi-truck, faced with his friends, Darnell and Nene. They've always kinda played these games where they'd try to 'get each other'. Must be one of those games of their's! What's up with these funky new outfits, though?
